channel.title: Adding a bank and making it work [562]
channel.description: Can someone tell me or show me how to add a bank booth somewhere and make it work when you click? thankx :D sorry for my noobness

item.title: Adding a bank and making it work [562]
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

bank booth id is 2213. go to client.java search makeGlobalObject Use The Caps ull see a bunch of things like this

makeGlobalObject(3089, 3499, 210, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3088, 3499, 210, 0, 10);

what u do is, copy one of those lines, paste at the end of the list. edit this
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, @@@@, 0, 10);

Key*
XXXX = X co-ord
YYYY = Y Co-rds
@@@@ = Object Id
keep last 2 numbers same. this is going to be ur code.
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 2213, 0, 10);
just edit the x andy co-ords goodluck

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a bank and making it work [562]
